Pre-Game Insights: The Royals will sweep the series with a win.
The Pirates are 70-78 overall and 37-40 in home games.
The Pirates have a 49-17 record in games when they have more hits than their opponents.
The Royals are 82-67 overall and 37-37 in road games.
The Royals have gone 52-19 in games when they scored five or more runs.
This will be the third time the teams meet this season.
